attributes.comment:
I am writing to express my concern for the increase in fees proposed for
immigrants and refugees. I personally work with refugees who have been invited
to live in this country legally. They are at a great disadvantage in the work force in
terms of the wages they are able to receive. All of the refugees I work with are
living at or below poverty levels even though they are working and paying taxes.
The extreme hike in fees for them to acquire green cards and to become citizens
will impose tremendous hardships on these families. For many this hike in fees
with cost them their ability to become citizens. A different method of financing for
this service is required in order to allow these families, who have been invited to
move to Utah, to fulfill their ability to follow through with their desires to become
full citizens of this country.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Yda Smith
